title: CPU Microprocessor Design Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services and customer experiences very quickly.
description: As an RTL Engineer, you will own or participate in microarchitecture development, RTL ownership, validation, performance exploration, design delivery, etc.
key_qualifications: Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience, direct CPU RTL experience, knowledge of microprocessor architecture, Verilog/VHDL, logic design principles, low power microarchitecture techniques, C/C++ programming, experience in Perl or Python.
education_experience: Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience
